title: Wednesday Post Show (05-11-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (05-11-22)
description:
Bobby shares that he talked to Andy Roddick yesterday and sent him the video from yesterday’s Post Show. Bobby also gives everyone a Trophy Challenge. We get into Eddie paying his fine for not listening during the show. We get an update on Morgan and the guy who gave her free items at the grocery store.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
